News.headline: Give Blood At Dagenham and Redbridge Football Club
News.page_title: Give Blood At Dagenham and Redbridge Football Club
News.URL_keywords: Give Blood At Dagenham and Redbridge Football Club
News.short_description: The Daggers will be holding a give blood event on Tuesday 13th December.
News.description:
There will be two separate times on Tuesday 13th December where you are able to give blood. The first will be from 12:40 to 15:00 and then 16:30 to 19:30.

For more information about the event visit the link here, or call 0300 123 2323.
